H0.text: In which Scottish border town was seven-a-side rugby first played. Jedburgh

H1.text: In which Scottish border town was seven-a-side rugby first played. Kelso

H2.text: In which Scottish border town was seven-a-side rugby first played. Galashiels

H3.text: In which Scottish border town was seven-a-side rugby first played. Melrose

A4.text: The first-ever sevens match was played at The Greenyards, the Melrose ground, where it was well received.

A5.text: Rugby sevens originated in the 1880s in the Scottish town of Melrose; the Melrose Sevens tournament is still played annually.
